page.title: 06Education The Primary School
page.content: Llandovery{County Primary School serves the 4-11 age group. It has{193 pupils 115 boys 78 {girls.}As well as the{town children the school also serves those from the {outlying districts}of Babel, Pentre-ty-gwyn, Siloh and Porthyrhyd. There are{8 teaching staff}including the special class (for those with learning difficulties) and a non teaching headmaster. The{majority}of children are taught in{English with Welsh as a second {language.}There are two teachers for the Welsh as a 1st language pupils. In this year of 1985 the girls won the Dinefwr Netball Tournament and the boys the rugby and softball cricket.Two{played rugby for West {Wales at Cardiff}before the Wales versus England game.
